document.heading: Temporary Auctioneer License Amendment Act of 1986

history.narrative: Law 6-181, the “Temporary Auctioneer License Amendment Act of 1986,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-222, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 21, 1986 and November 5, 1986, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 25, 1986, it was assigned Act No. 6-232 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
